A rung lower in Collins' leadership hierarchy were the Level 4 types: those who catalyze commitment to and vigorous pursuit of a clear and compelling vision -- the profile of most enduring technology industry founder-CEOs. While company needs will vary, there's a strong case for why the visionary variety of CEO still matters in technology more than any other industry. Innovation
